text:
"I got so excited I was afraid that I might die or something.” -Dr. Katalin Karikó on the news that the Pfizer-BioNTech #coronavirus #vaccine, based on rsrch she pioneered & risked her career for, was >90% effective against #COVID19.

 #WomenInSTEM #VaccinesWork 
cc @NobelPrize https://t.co/xJpwTUG1eB
